message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. Is this a price you'd be interested in?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping for a price closer to my budget. Could we discuss a price around $90?
I understand that $90 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I can meet you in the middle at $110. Would you be willing to go up to $110 for the product?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $100, which is closer to my budget. I hope this meets your needs as well.
